food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys like to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love me!
💛 I am a fruit with a yellow skin.
🌙 I am shaped like a crescent.

food.question: I am white and cold, you eat me with a spoon in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold.
🥄 You need a spoon to eat me.
☀️ I am a tasty treat on a hot day.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. I grow on trees and keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 Doctors don't like me.
🔴 I am often red.

food.question: I am crunchy and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐰 Rabbits love to eat me.
🧡 I am the color of a pumpkin.

food.question: I am small and green, I grow in a pod, and you might eat me with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in a pod.
🟢 I am green.
🍽️ I am often eaten with dinner.

food.question: I am a grain that is cooked, often served with butter. I'm fluffy and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am a type of grain.
🧈 I taste good with butter.
☁️ I am fluffy and white.

food.question: I am made from milk and I can be hard or soft. Mice like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am made from milk.
🐭 Mice love to eat me.
🧀 I can be hard or soft.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in the oven. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often sliced.
🔥 I am baked in the oven.
🥪 You can make sandwiches with me.

food.question: I am juicy and orange. I grow on trees and I am full of vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am a citrus fruit.
☀️ I am the same color as the sun.
💪 I am full of Vitamin C.

food.question: I am long and brown. I grow underground. You can mash me, fry me, or bake me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am a root vegetable.
🌍 I grow underground.
🍟 You can make fries out of me.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a healthy snack.
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I grow in a garden. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 Bees like to visit me.
🚿 I need water to grow.
💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am big and strong, with leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🪵 You can build a house with my wood.

plant.question: I am long and thin and grow in the ground. I am orange and good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me!
🚜 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me helps you see better.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on a vine. I am small and round and can be green or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍷 You can make juice from me.
🧺 People pick me in vineyards.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows kernels. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am often yellow.
🍿 You can make a snack out of me by heating me up.
🌻 I can grow very tall in a field.

plant.question: I am a big, round, red fruit that grows on a vine. I am mostly water and very juicy. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am a popular fruit in the summer.
🌱 I have black seeds inside.
🫙 My inside flesh is usually red.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
👨‍🍳 Chefs often steam me.
💪 Eating me makes you strong.

plant.question: I have prickly stems and beautiful, fragrant flowers. People often give me as a gift to show love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am a classic symbol of romance.
🥀 Be careful of my thorns.
🌷 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am a plant that is used to make yummy brown liquid that many grown-ups drink in the morning. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I give grown ups energy to start their day!
🌎 I grow in warm places far away!
🍒 My beans need to be roasted.
